Token.Abstract: The RKRelationshipMapping class is used to describe relationships of a class in an RKObjectMapping or an entity in an RKEntityMapping object.

Creates and returns a new relationship mapping object describing how to transform a related object representation at sourceKeyPath to a new representation at destinationKeyPath using the given mapping.

Parameter.Name: sourceKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: A key path from which to retrieve data in the source object representation that is to be mapped as a relationship. If nil, then the mapping is performed directly against the parent object representation.

Parameter.Name: destinationKeyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path on the destination object to set the object mapped results.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: A mapping object describing how to map the data retrieved from sourceKeyPath that is to be set on destinationKeyPath.

Token.Abstract: An RKMapping object describing how to map the object representation at sourceKeyPath to a new represenation at destinationKeyPath.
An RKMapping object describing how to map the object representation at sourceKeyPath to a new represenation at destinationKeyPath.
The assignment policy to use when applying the relationship mapping.
The assignment policy to use when applying the relationship mapping.
